channel.title: Github weblogging
channel.description: A free, simple github-based blogging platform

item.title: How to set up your own Github blog
item.description:
A Quickstart Guide

By far the easiest way to install your own copy of this Github blog is to head on over to http://github.com/pomax/gh-blog and click the "fork" button, so that you get a copy of the gh-blog repository, but on your own account.

If you just want to install it to play with it, that's all you have to do in terms of "getting the code".

Getting credentials so that you can edit/modify/delete posts directly

...text goes here...
